alert.note: Alert for Asotin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 21 at 7:58PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of North Central Idaho, including the following county, Nez Perce. Portions of Southeast Washington, including the following county, Asotin. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 756 PM PDT, Trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in the advisory area from thunderstorms. Minor flooding is expected. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lewiston, Clarkston, Clarkston Heights-Vineland, West Clarkston-Highland, Asotin, Jerry, Clarkston Heights and Anatone. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
